alert.note: Alert for Cherokee (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 3:49AM EST until further notice by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Georgia... Etowah River at Canton affecting Cherokee County. Etowah River at GA 9 near Dawsonville affecting Forsyth and Dawson Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia... Etowah River Downstream I-575 at Canton affecting Cherokee County. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Etowah River Downstream I-575 at Canton. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 22.0 feet, Minor flooding expands much further into the woodlands and fields along the river generally east of Canton near the Interstate 575 bridge. A grassy lot behind a pump station off of Riverstone Parkway and areas behind the businesses on Old Ball Ground Highway and Keith Drive are flooded with up to 3 feet of water. An inground electrical box near the pump station and truck trailers at the end of Keith Drive will begin to flood. Flood waters will surround the wooden structure supporting the USGS gage house. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:45 AM EST Wednesday the stage was 21.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 2:45 AM EST Wednesday was 21.5 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 20.9 feet on 02/04/2022. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta. The next statement will be issued at 300 PM EST.early this morning at 515 AM EST.
